function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Transmission of the bubonic plague through trade routes, mainly via fleas carried by rats and other infected animals.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risks associated with the potential failure of solutions to reduce covid-19 risks over time","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risks of inadequate solutions leading to ongoing covid-19 transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risks of overlooking broader sustainability in the pursuit of covid-19 risk reduction","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential temporary changes to the built environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of sustainability in the built environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential contamination by covid-19 and other fresh outbreaks of the virus","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of focus on built environment in covid-19 research","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Neglect of sustainable development in disease control","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Focus on behavioral controls over structural changes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Globalization leading to increased movement of people and goods, and rapid dissemination of ideas, increasing the potential for transmission of infectious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Urbanization altering the consequences of infectious diseases, with cities creating conditions for the growth and spread of new microorganisms.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited focus on the built environment in covid-19 research and publications, with less than 1% of articles addressing the impact on buildings and built environments.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global spread of infectious diseases like covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unclear efficacy of protection against re-infections in people with and without symptoms at their initial sars-cov-2 infection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Accumulating evidence on the efficacy and duration of natural immunity contributing to the mitigation of the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incomplete vaccination data due to vaccinations taking place outside of the health system","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lower testing frequency in previously sars-cov-2 infected participants versus the control group","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Seroprevalence surveys suggesting higher infection rates than reported sars-cov-2 cases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difficulty for operators in the adoption of technology due to limitations of the model","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Data collected during the initial testing period may be affected by the learning phase of individuals","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Addition of new smartphones to digitalize a larger clinic introduces scalability and data management challenges.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of smartphone application with nfc technology","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Data collection and analysis from 10 smartphones","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unbalanced integration of different types of resources","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Expansion of the digital twin framework to a bigger case may involve the introduction of new smartphones and badges, leading to potential risks of contamination and disease spread.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High probability of individuals having a body temperature lower than 37.5 c","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate anamnesis and rejection probability","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Elderly people taking more time for forms fill-in and vaccine inoculation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Probability differences between adults and elderly people","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Time measurements and distributions for vaccination process parameters","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of physical system data in virtual system","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Operators sharing data without proper sanitation or protection measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate translation of unix time stamp into date and time","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of visibility into the number of patients and their contact with the badges increases the difficulty of contact tracing and containment of contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate mapping of the real process due to incomplete or unreliable data","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Resource overutilization leading to employee burnout and dissatisfaction","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate vaccination process flowchart","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for dynamic factors in the simulation model","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Possibility of undetected contagious individuals entering the vaccination process","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for transmission of disease during the waiting period post-inoculation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Integration of simulation with industry 4.0 creating a digital twin.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Constant bidirectional flow of information between physical and virtual systems.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Mobile application collecting time measures and sending them to decision-makers.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Wearable sensors and medical equipment may act as fomites for the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Real-time communication of disease status may lead to privacy and security risks.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Integration of iot technologies may introduce vulnerabilities to the healthcare system.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of digital twin technology in healthcare for remote monitoring and treatment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of digital twin technology in manufacturing for decision support","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of data integration between physical and virtual objects","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"}]}
